alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 10:12AM EDT until March 26 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Western Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... North central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 1045 AM EDT. * At 1012 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Matthews, or 11 miles north of Brookdale, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... St. Matthews, Fort Motte, Creston, Lone Star and Low Falls Landing. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 131 and 145. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clarendon; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter
